casebody.data:
Charles Wayne SILVERS, Petitioner
v.
Geroge KENWORTHY, Respondent. No. 2P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 7, 2004. Charles Wayne Silvers, Pro Se. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, for Kenworthy.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the application filed by Petitioner in this matter for Writ of Habeas Corpus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Robeson County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th day of January 2004."
